name: Vitreous (Autoghost)
author: ywkls
info: An attempt to recreate battle against Vitreous from LTTP.
description: Creates a core boss and 4 eyes. The core fires a laser at you occasionally. After you defeat the 4 eyes, 4 more appear and it fires the laser more often. After you beat them, it becomes vulnerable; starts moving around and fires the laser even more frequently.Update- 8-17-15-  Added exploding death animation.Update- 10-9-17- Completely rewrote script. Added lightning attack, thanks to Dimentio.
setup: Create the main foe , a 2 x 2 enemy. Create the smaller eyes, a 1 x 1 enemy.Create 2 combos. The first for the stationary boss. The second for the boss as it moves around.Select sound effects and set that constant.Requires-std.zhstring.zhghost.zhlaser.zh- zipped with the example quest and link in my signature.
